directions: Stir the mango, papaya, onion, garlic, jalapeno pepper, red bell pepper, orange bell pepper, lime juice, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Enjoy immediately or cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to use.
ingredients: 1/2 small ripe mango, peeled and cubed
1/2 small papaya, peeled, seeded and cubed
1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Mango Papaya Salsa
